mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, TYPE) VALUES (MEMBER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, TYPE, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD') regdate, IMAGE_PATH FROM MEMBER ORDER BY regdate DESC
select ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE, IMAGE_PATH from MEMBER where EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 'enabled'
select ID, EMAIL, NAME, TYPE, IMAGE_PATH from MEMBER where EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND STATUS = 'enabled'

SELECT "month", COUNT(regdate) "memberCount" FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -ROWNUM + 1), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') "month" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON TO_CHAR(TRUNC(regdate, 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM') = "month" AND MEMBER.TYPE = 'guest' AND MEMBER.STATUS = 'enabled' GROUP BY "month" ORDER BY "month"
SELECT GENDER "gender", COUNT(*) "count" FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' AND MEMBER.TYPE = 'guest' GROUP BY GENDER
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM MEMBER WHERE REGDATE between TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)) and SYSDATE
